short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you with applying for Social Security more efficiently. The extension is exclusively for Relocare Compliance App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's legal required for employees travelling for business  purpose to apply for A1 application based in their home country. This extension help them fill out the forms based on the existing data. Helping companies to reduce mistakes and improve efficiency while applying for A1 applications
